Row.Text: {1_LeaderName} {1_LeaderName : gender m?висловив; f?висловила;} повагу {2_LeaderName : gender m?іншому лідеру; f?іншій лідерці;} через свою рису - {3_AgendaName}. Напевно, це - {2_LeaderName}.
{1_LeaderName} {1_LeaderName : gender m?висловив; f?висловила;} зневагу {2_LeaderName : gender m?іншому лідеру; f?іншій лідерці;} через свою рису - {3_AgendaName}. Напевно, це - {2_LeaderName}.
{1_CivName} щойно отримали нового союзника. І це {2_CivName}.
There has been a coup d'état in {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} removing the regime of {2_Government}. Anarchy has begun.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?is; other?are;} facing a barbarian invasion at {2_CityName}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} heard that the sunbathing is great at the new seaside resort outside {2_CityName}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} just liberated {2_CityName} giving it back to {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {3_CivName}}.
{1_CivName} знесли нещодавно захоплене місто. Колишні його господарі - {2_CivName}.
{2_UnitName} {2_UnitName : plural 1?{2_UnitName : gender m?зруйнував; f?зруйнувала;}; 2?зруйнували;} {3_ImprovementName}. Це були - {1_CivName}.
{1_CivName} та {2_CivName} оголосили про договір дружби між своїми націями.
{1_CivName} прийняли у себе делегацію іншої нації. Це - {2_CivName}.
A new building has appeared in the capital of {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}}: a permanent embassy from {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {2_CivName}}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?is; other?are;} beginning a military assault on {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {2_CivName}}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?is; other?are;} considering a war on {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {2_CivName}}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} launched an inquisition rooting out heretics opposed to {2_ReligionName}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} a {2_UnitName} that just earned the {3_PromotionName} promotion.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} a {2_UnitName} that just earned the {3_PromotionName} promotion.
{1_CivName} розграбували вороже покращення - {2_TargetName}. {3_UnitName : plural 1?{3_UnitName : gender m?Помічено їхній; f?Помічено їхню;}; 2?Помічені їхні;} {3_UnitName}.
{1_CivName} оновили політики уряду. {2_SlotName} політика була впроваджена. Це - {3_PolicyName}.
Pilgrims from {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} are now flocking to see the holy relic: {2_RelicName}.
Scientists from {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} and {2_CivName} have formed a scientific partnership.
{3_SpyPlayer} had their spy in {2_CityName} captured by {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had their Spaceport in {2_CityName} sabotaged by a spy from {3_SpyPlayer}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had their Spaceport in {2_CityName} sabotaged by an unknown spy.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had a Great Work in {2_CityName} stolen by a spy from {3_SpyPlayer}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had a Great Work in {2_CityName} stolen by an unknown spy.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?is; other?are;} trying to put down partisans in {2_CityName} that were recruited by {3_SpyPlayer}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?is; other?are;} trying to put down partisans in {2_CityName} that were recruited by an unknown spy.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had their Industrial Zone in {2_CityName} sabotaged by a spy from {3_SpyPlayer}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had their Industrial Zone in {2_CityName} sabotaged by an unknown spy.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had funds stolen in {2_CityName} by a spy from {3_SpyPlayer}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had funds stolen in {2_CityName} by an unknown spy.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had technology plans stolen in {2_CityName} by a spy from {3_SpyPlayer}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} had technology plans stolen in {2_CityName} by an unknown spy.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} reneged on a deal with {LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {2_CivName}}.
{1_CivName} збираються шукати місце під майбутнє місто. {2_UnitName} вже готові.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} just finished training the world's first {2_UnitName}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} trained a unique unit, the {2_UnitName}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?is; other?are;} no longer seeking a {2_VictoryType}.
{LOC_GRAMMAR_CIVNAME << {1_CivName}} {1_CivName : plural 1?has; other?have;} just unleashed a Weapon of Mass Destruction! A {2_UnitName}! Duck and cover!
{1_CivName} звільнили ділянку землі біля міста {2_CityName} для масштабного будівництва. Напевно, це - {3_BuildingName}.
Your lady-in-waiting, {1_Name}, heard at the court ball that
{1_Name : gender m?Наш безстрашний репортер; f?Наша безстрашна репортерка;} {1_Name} {1_Name : gender m?зв'ясував; f?зв'ясувала;}, що
Mary Katherine Goddard's Great Merchant effect
Send a delegation or establish an embassy.
Send a Spy on a Listening Post mission.
Use Mary Katherine Goddard's Great Merchant ability.
